pullrequest.title: Example scripts for controlling arms, neck and head

content.raw:
Replace the bad file with the previous good version.

Do NOT make any other changes to the software until after the 21st. This is too late in the qualifying round to introduce new software, either bug fixed or enhancements. 

This bad version release is a good reason why no changes except the reversion should be made at this point. We're just as likely to get a bug as a fix.
